title: Region Sports Network Week 7 Roundup
text:
Written by Region Sports Network Last Updated on 02 October 2015 
The 2015 Northwest Indiana high school football season is heading for the home stretch and Region Sports Network has all the information you want leading into the Week 7 action! 
The RSN team has an in-depth preview of the Valparaiso vs. Merrillville game , which features the RSN #8 team in their weekly Top 10 poll , (the Vikings) hosting the #8 team (the Pirates) in Valpo's homecoming. 
In their Around the Region roundup , RSN also previews all the other region games like Munster at Hobart, River Forest at Lake Station, Clark at Gavit, Griffith at Highland, Whiting at Calumet, Indy Northwest at East Chicago central, La Porte at Crown Point, Hanover Central at Wheeler, Bowman at West Side, Kankakee Valley at Andrean, Portage at Michigan City, North Newton at South Central, Indy Marshall at Hammond, Boone Grove at Bishop Noll, Rensselaer Central at West Lafayette, North Judson at Triton. 
Tune into www.RegionSports.com tonight for the RSN Chevy Game Night as the Lowell Brickies take on the Hobart Brickies !
